   20: 
   21: %%
   22: -module(ssl_session_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   27: -include("tls_handshake.hrl").
   28: -include("ssl_record.hrl").
   29: 
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   32: 
   33: %% Common test
   34: -export([all/0,
   35:          groups/0,
   36:          init_per_suite/1,
   37:          init_per_group/2,
   38:          init_per_testcase/2,
   39:          end_per_suite/1,
   40:          end_per_group/2,
   41:          end_per_testcase/2
   42:         ]).
   43: 
   44: %% Test cases
   45:  -export([reuse_session/0,
   46:          reuse_session/1,
   47:          reuse_session_expired/0,
   48:          reuse_session_expired/1,
   49:          server_does_not_want_to_reuse_session/0,
   50:          server_does_not_want_to_reuse_session/1,
   51:          explicit_session_reuse/0,
   52:          explicit_session_reuse/1,
   53:          explicit_session_reuse_expired/0,
   54:          explicit_session_reuse_expired/1,
   55:          no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert/0,
   56:          no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert/1,
   57:          no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert_file/0,
   58:          no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert_file/1,
   59:          client_max_session_table/0,
   60:          client_max_session_table/1, 
   61:          server_max_session_table/0,
   62:          server_max_session_table/1, 
   63:          session_table_stable_size_on_tcp_close/0,
   64:          session_table_stable_size_on_tcp_close/1
   65:         ]).
   66: 
   67: -define(SLEEP, 500).
   68: -define(EXPIRE, 2).
   69: -define(CLIENT_CB, ssl_client_session_cache_db).
   70: 
   71: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   72: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   73: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   74: all() -> 
   75:     [
   76:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   77:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   78:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
   79:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   80:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
   81:     ].
   82: 
   83: groups() ->
   84:     [{'dtlsv1.2', [], session_tests()},
   85:      {'dtlsv1', [], session_tests()},
   86:      {'tlsv1.3', [], session_tests() ++ tls_session_tests()},
   87:      {'tlsv1.2', [], session_tests() ++ tls_session_tests()},
   88:      {'tlsv1.1', [], session_tests() ++ tls_session_tests()},
   89:      {'tlsv1', [], session_tests() ++ tls_session_tests()}
   90:     ].
   91: 
   92: session_tests() ->
   93:     [reuse_session,
   94:      reuse_session_expired,
   95:      server_does_not_want_to_reuse_session,
   96:      explicit_session_reuse,
   97:      explicit_session_reuse_expired,
   98:      no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert,
   99:      no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert_file,
  100:      client_max_session_table,
  101:      server_max_session_table
  102:     ].
  103: 
  104: tls_session_tests() ->
  105:        [session_table_stable_size_on_tcp_close].
  106: 
  107: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  108:     catch crypto:stop(),
  109:     try crypto:start() of
  110: 	ok ->
  111: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  112:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  113:             ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_1024_cert(Config)
  114:     catch _:_ ->
  115: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  116:     end.
  117: 
  118: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  119:     ssl:stop(),
  120:     application:stop(crypto).
  121: 
  122: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  123:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config). 
  124: 
  125: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  126:   ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  127: 
  128: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config)  when TestCase == reuse_session_expired;
  129:                                           TestCase == explicit_session_reuse_expired ->
  130:     Versions = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  131:     ssl:stop(),
  132:     application:load(ssl),    
  133:     ssl_test_lib:clean_env(),
  134:     ssl_test_lib:set_protocol_versions(Versions),
  135:     application:set_env(ssl, session_lifetime, ?EXPIRE),
  136:     ssl:start(),
  137:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  138:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 30}),
  139:     Config;
  140: init_per_testcase(client_max_session_table, Config) ->
  141:     Versions = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  142:     ssl:stop(),
  143:     application:load(ssl),    
  144:     ssl_test_lib:clean_env(),
  145:     ssl_test_lib:set_protocol_versions(Versions),
  146:     application:set_env(ssl, session_cache_client_max, 2),
  147:     ssl:start(),
  148:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  149:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 30}),
  150:     Config;
  151: init_per_testcase(server_max_session_table, Config) ->
  152:     Versions = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  153:     ssl:stop(),
  154:     application:load(ssl),    
  155:     ssl_test_lib:clean_env(),
  156:     ssl_test_lib:set_protocol_versions(Versions),
  157:     application:set_env(ssl, session_cache_server_max, 2),
  158:     ssl:start(),
  159:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  160:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 30}),
  161:     Config;
  162: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  163:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 30}),
  164:     Config.
  165: 
  166: end_per_testcase(reuse_session_expired, Config) ->
  167:     application:unset_env(ssl, session_lifetime),    
  168:     Config;
  169: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  170:     Config.
  171: 
  172: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  173: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  174: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  175: reuse_session() ->
  176:     [{doc,"Test reuse of sessions (short handshake)"}].
  177: reuse_session(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  178:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  179:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  180:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  181:     ssl_test_lib:reuse_session([{versions,[Version]} | ClientOpts], 
  182:                                [{versions,[Version]} | ServerOpts], Config).
  183: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  184: reuse_session_expired() ->
  185:     [{doc,"Test sessions is not reused when it has expired"}].
  186: reuse_session_expired(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  187:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  188:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  189:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  190:     
  191:     Server0 =
  192: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  193: 				   {from, self()},
  194: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  195: 				   {tcp_options, [{active, false}]},
  196: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  197:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  198:     
  199:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  200:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  201:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  202:                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_sessions, save} | ClientOpts]}]),
  203:     Server0 ! listen,
  204:     
  205:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  206:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  207:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  208:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),    
  209:     
  210:     SID = receive
  211:               {Client0, Id0} ->
  212:                   Id0
  213:           end,
  214:        
  215:     receive
  216:         {Client1, SID} ->
  217:             ok
  218:     after ?SLEEP ->
  219:               ct:fail(session_not_reused)
  220:     end,
  221:     
  222:     Server0 ! listen,
  223:     
  224:     %% Make sure session is unregistered due to expiration
  225:     ct:sleep({seconds, ?EXPIRE*2}),
  226: 
  227:     make_sure_expired(Hostname, Port0, SID),
  228:     
  229:     Client2 =
  230: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, 
  231: 				   {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  232: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  233: 				   {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts}]),   
  234:     receive
  235: 	{Client2, SID} ->
  236:             end_per_testcase(?FUNCTION_NAME, Config),
  237: 	    ct:fail(session_reused_when_session_expired);
  238: 	{Client2, _} ->
  239: 	    ok
  240:     end,
  241:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  242:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
  243:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  244:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  245:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client2).
  246: 
  247: make_sure_expired(Host, Port, Id) ->
  248:     {status, _, _, StatusInfo} = sys:get_status(whereis(ssl_manager)),
  249:     [_, _,_, _, Prop] = StatusInfo,
  250:     State = ssl_test_lib:state(Prop),
  251:     ClientCache = element(2, State),
  252: 
  253:     case ssl_client_session_cache_db:lookup(ClientCache, {{Host,  Port}, Id}) of
  254: 	undefined ->
  255:    	   ok; 
  256: 	#session{is_resumable = false} ->
  257:    	   ok;
  258: 	_ ->
  259: 	    ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
  260:             make_sure_expired(Host, Port, Id)
  261:     end.     
  262: 
  263: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  264: server_does_not_want_to_reuse_session() ->
  265:     [{doc,"Test reuse of sessions (short handshake)"}].
  266: server_does_not_want_to_reuse_session(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  267:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  268:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  269:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  270: 
  271:     Server = 
  272: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  273: 				   {from, self()},
  274: 		      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  275: 				   {options, [{reuse_session, fun(_,_,_,_) ->
  276: 								      false
  277: 							      end} | 
  278: 					      ServerOpts]}]),
  279:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  280:     Client0 =
  281: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, 
  282: 		      {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  283: 			    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  284: 		      {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),   
  285:     SessionInfo = 
  286: 	receive
  287: 	    {Server, Info} ->
  288: 		Info
  289: 	end,
  290:        
  291:     Server ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}}},
  292:     
  293:     %% Make sure session is registered
  294:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
  295: 
  296:     Client1 =
  297: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, 
  298: 		      {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  299: 		      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  300: 		      {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),    
  301:     receive
  302: 	{Client1, SessionInfo} ->
  303: 	    ct:fail(session_reused_when_server_does_not_want_to);
  304: 	{Client1, _Other} ->
  305: 	   ok
  306:     end,
  307:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  308:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  309:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  310: 
  311: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  312: explicit_session_reuse() ->
  313:     [{doc,"Test {reuse_session, {ID, Data}}} option for explicit reuse of sessions not"
  314:      " saved in the clients automated session reuse"}].
  315: explicit_session_reuse(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  316:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  317:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  318:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  319: 
  320:     Server =
  321: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  322:                                    {from, self()},
  323:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  324:                                    {options, ServerOpts}]),
  325:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  326:     {Client0, Client0Sock} =
  327: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  328:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  329:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  330:                                    {from, self()}, {options, [{reuse_sessions, false} | ClientOpts]},
  331:                                    return_socket
  332:                                   ]),
  333: 
  334:     {ok, [{session_id, ID}, {session_data, SessData}]} = ssl:connection_information(Client0Sock, [session_id, session_data]),
  335: 
  336:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  337: 
  338:     Server ! listen,
  339: 
  340:     {_, Client1Sock} =
  341: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  342:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  343:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  344:                                    {from, self()}, {options, [{reuse_session, {ID, SessData}} | ClientOpts]},
  345:                                    return_socket]),
  346: 
  347:     {ok, [{session_id, ID}]} = ssl:connection_information(Client1Sock, [session_id]).
  348: 
  349: 
  350: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  351: 
  352: explicit_session_reuse_expired() ->
  353:     [{doc,"Test to reuse a session that has expired and make sure server session table is correctly handled"}].
  354: explicit_session_reuse_expired(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  355:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  356:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  357:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  358: 
  359:     Server =
  360: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  361:                                    {from, self()},
  362:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  363:                                    {options, ServerOpts}]),
  364:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  365:     {Client0, Client0Sock} =
  366: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  367:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  368:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  369:                                    {from, self()}, {options, [{reuse_sessions, false} | ClientOpts]},
  370:                                    return_socket
  371:                                   ]),
  372:     %% Retrieve session data
  373:     {ok, [{session_id, ID0}, {session_data, SessData}]} = ssl:connection_information(Client0Sock, [session_id, session_data]),
  374: 
  375:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  376: 
  377:     Server ! listen,
  378: 
  379:     SupName = sup_name(ServerOpts),
  380:     Sup = whereis(SupName),
  381:     %% Will only be one process, that is one server, in our test scenario
  382:     [{_, SessionCachePid, worker,[ssl_server_session_cache]}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup),
  383: 
  384:     %% Start a new connections so there are three sessions
  385:     {Client1, Client1Sock}  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  386:                                           {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  387:                                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  388:                                           {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_sessions, save} | ClientOpts]},
  389:                                                          return_socket]),
  390: 
  391:     Server ! listen,
  392: 
  393:     {Client2, Client2Sock}  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  394:                                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  395:                                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  396:                                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_sessions, save} | ClientOpts]},
  397:                                                          return_socket]),
  398: 
  399:     {ok, [{session_id, ID1}]} = ssl:connection_information(Client1Sock, [session_id]),
  400: 
  401:     %% Assert three sessions in server table
  402:     {SessionCacheCb, SessionCacheDb} = session_cachce_info(SessionCachePid),
  403:     3 = SessionCacheCb:size(SessionCacheDb),
  404: 
  405:     Server ! listen,
  406: 
  407:     {ok, [{session_id, ID2}]} = ssl:connection_information(Client2Sock, [session_id]),
  408: 
  409:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  410:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client2),
  411: 
  412:     %% Make sure session expired
  413:     ct:sleep({seconds, ?EXPIRE*2}),
  414: 
  415:     %% Try to reuse session one after expiration
  416:     {_, Client3Sock} =
  417: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  418:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  419:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  420:                                    {from, self()}, {options, [{reuse_session, {ID0, SessData}} | ClientOpts]},
  421:                                    return_socket]),
  422: 
  423:     %% Verify that we got a new session
  424:     {ok, [{session_id, ID3}]} = ssl:connection_information(Client3Sock, [session_id]),
  425: 
  426:     %% We tried reusing ID0. So ID1 and ID2 should not be possible but assert anyway
  427:     true = (ID3=/= ID0) andalso (ID3 =/= ID1) andalso (ID3 =/= ID2),
  428: 
  429:     %% Server table should have removed the expired session that we tried to reuse.
  430:     %% and replaced the second one that expired. Leaving the third and the new
  431:     {SessionCacheCb1, SessionCacheDb1} = session_cachce_info(SessionCachePid),
  432:     2 = SessionCacheCb1:size(SessionCacheDb1),
  433: 
  434: 
  435:     Server ! listen,
  436: 
  437:     %% Make sure session expired
  438:     ct:sleep({seconds, ?EXPIRE*2}),
  439: 
  440: 
  441:     %% Nothing is removed yet
  442:     {SessionCacheCb2, SessionCacheDb2} = session_cachce_info(SessionCachePid),
  443:     2 = SessionCacheCb2:size(SessionCacheDb2),
  444: 
  445: 
  446:     {_, Client4Sock} =
  447: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  448:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  449:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  450:                                    {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts},
  451:                                    return_socket]),
  452: 
  453:     %% Expired session is not reused
  454:     {ok, [{session_id, ID4}]} = ssl:connection_information(Client4Sock, [session_id]),
  455:     true = (ID4 =/= ID3),
  456: 
  457:     %% One expired session is replaced
  458:     {SessionCacheCb3, SessionCacheDb3} = session_cachce_info(SessionCachePid),
  459:     2 = SessionCacheCb3:size(SessionCacheDb3).
  460: 
  461: 
  462: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  463: no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert() ->
  464:     [{doc,"Check that a session is not reused if the server is restarted with a new cert."}].
  465: no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  466:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_der_opts, Config),
  467:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_verify_opts, Config),
  468:     POpts = proplists:get_value(protocol_opts, Config, []),
  469: 
  470:     #{client_config := NewCOpts,
  471:       server_config := NewSOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(rsa,
  472:                                                                      [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  473:                                                                       [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}],
  474:                                                                       [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]]),
  475: 
  476:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  477: 
  478:     Server0 =
  479: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  480: 				   {from, self()},
  481:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  482: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  483:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  484:     Client0 =
  485: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  486:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  487:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  488:                                    {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_sessions, save} | ClientOpts]}]),
  489:     Info0 = receive {Server0, Info00} -> Info00 end,
  490:     Info0 = receive {Client0, Info01} -> Info01 end,
  491: 
  492:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
  493:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  494:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
  495: 
  496:     Server1 = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  497:                                          {from, self()},
  498:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  499:                                          {options, [{reuseaddr, true} | NewSOpts ++ POpts]}]),
  500: 
  501:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  502:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  503:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  504:                                          {from, self()},  {options, NewCOpts ++ POpts}]),
  505:     Info1 = receive {Server1, Info10} -> Info10 end,
  506: 
  507:     receive
  508: 	{Client1, Info0} ->
  509: 	    ct:fail(session_reused_when_server_has_new_cert);
  510: 	{Client1, Info1} ->
  511:             ?CT_LOG("First: ~p~nSecond ~p~n",[Info0, Info1]);
  512:         Unexpected ->
  513:             ct:fail({unexpected, Unexpected, {Client1, Info1}})
  514:     end,
  515:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server1),
  516:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  517: 
  518: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  519: no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert_file() ->
  520:     [{doc,"Check that a session is not reused if a server is restarted with a new "
  521:       "cert contained in a file with the same name as the old cert."}].
  522: 
  523: no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  524:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  525:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  526:     POpts = proplists:get_value(protocol_opts, Config, []),
  527: 
  528:     #{client_config := NewCOpts,
  529:       server_config := NewSOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_pem(rsa,
  530:                                                                      [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  531:                                                                       [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}],
  532:                                                                       [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]],
  533:                                                                      Config, "ssl_session_new_rsa"),
  534:     PrivDir =  proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  535: 
  536:     NewServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:new_config(PrivDir, ServerOpts),
  537:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  538: 
  539:     Server =
  540: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  541: 				   {from, self()},
  542:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  543: 				   {options, NewServerOpts0}]),
  544:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  545:     Client0 =
  546: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  547:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  548:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  549:                                    {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),
  550:     SessionInfo =
  551: 	receive
  552: 	    {Server, Info} ->
  553: 		Info
  554: 	end,
  555: 
  556:     %% Make sure session is registered and we get
  557:     %% new file time stamp when calling new_config!
  558:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP* 2),
  559:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  560:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  561: 
  562:     ssl:clear_pem_cache(),
  563: 
  564:     NewServerOpts1 = ssl_test_lib:new_config(PrivDir, NewSOpts),
  565: 
  566:     Server1 =
  567: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  568: 				   {from, self()},
  569:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  570: 				   {options,  [{reuseaddr, true} | NewServerOpts1 ++ POpts]}]),
  571:     Client1 =
  572: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  573:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  574:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  575: 				   {from, self()},  {options, NewCOpts ++ POpts}]),
  576:     receive
  577: 	{Client1, SessionInfo} ->
  578: 	    ct:fail(session_reused_when_server_has_new_cert);
  579: 	{Client1, _Other} ->
  580: 	   ok
  581:     end,
  582:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server1),
  583:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  584: 
  585: 
  586: client_max_session_table() ->
  587:       [{doc, "Check that max session table limit is not exceeded, set max to 2 in init_per_testcase"}].
  588: 
  589: client_max_session_table(Config) when is_list(Config)->
  590:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  591:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  592:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  593:     test_max_session_limit(ClientOpts,ServerOpts,ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName),    
  594:     %% Explicit check table size
  595:     {status, _, _, StatusInfo} = sys:get_status(whereis(ssl_manager)),
  596:     [_, _,_, _, Prop] = StatusInfo,
  597:     State = ssl_test_lib:state(Prop),
  598:     ClientCache = element(2, State),	
  599:     2 = ?CLIENT_CB:size(ClientCache).
  600:     
  601: server_max_session_table() ->
  602:       [{doc, "Check that max session table limit exceeded, set max to 2 in init_per_testcase"}].
  603: 
  604: server_max_session_table(Config) when is_list(Config)->
  605:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  606:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  607:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  608:     test_max_session_limit(ClientOpts,ServerOpts,ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName),
  609:     %% Explicit check table size
  610:     SupName = sup_name(ServerOpts),
  611:     Sup = whereis(SupName),
  612:     %% Will only be one process, that is one server, in our test scenario
  613:     [{_, SessionCachePid, worker,[ssl_server_session_cache]}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup),
  614:     {SessionCacheCb, SessionCacheDb} = session_cachce_info(SessionCachePid),
  615:     N = SessionCacheCb:size(SessionCacheDb),
  616:     true = N == 2.
  617: 
  618: session_table_stable_size_on_tcp_close() ->
  619:       [{doc, "Check that new sessions are cleanup when connection is closed abruptly during first handshake"}].
  620: 
  621: session_table_stable_size_on_tcp_close(Config) when is_list(Config)->
  622:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  623:     {_, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  624: 
  625:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  626:                                         {from, self()},
  627:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  628:                                         {options,  [{reuseaddr, true} | ServerOpts]}]),
  629:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  630: 
  631:     Sup = whereis(ssl_server_session_cache_sup),
  632: 
  633:     %% Will only be one process, that is one server, in our test scenario
  634:     [{_, SessionCachePid, worker,[ssl_server_session_cache]}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup),
  635: 
  636: 
  637:     {SessionCacheCb, SessionCacheDb} = session_cachce_info(SessionCachePid),
  638: 
  639:     N = SessionCacheCb:size(SessionCacheDb),
  640: 
  641:     faulty_client(Hostname, Port),
  642:     check_table_did_not_grow(SessionCachePid, N).
  643: 
  644: 
  645: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  646: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  647: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  648: session_cachce_info(SessionCache) ->
  649:     State = sys:get_state(SessionCache),
  650:     ServerCacheDb = element(4, State),
  651:     ServerCacheCb = element(2, State),
  652:     {ServerCacheCb, ServerCacheDb}.
  653: 
  654: 
  655: check_table_did_not_grow(SessionCachePid, N) ->
  656:     {SessionCacheCb, SessionCacheDb} = session_cachce_info(SessionCachePid),
  657:     ?CT_LOG("Run ~p ~p", [SessionCacheCb, SessionCacheDb]),
  658:     case catch SessionCacheCb:size(SessionCacheDb) of
  659:         N ->
  660:             ok;
  661:         Size ->
  662:             ct:fail({table_grew, [{expected, N}, {got, Size}]})
  663:     end.
  664: 
  665: faulty_client(Host, Port) ->
  666:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect(Host, Port, [], 10000),
  667:     Random = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(32),
  668:     CH = client_hello(Random),
  669:     CHBin = encode_client_hello(CH, Random),
  670:     gen_tcp:send(Sock, CHBin),
  671:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
  672:     gen_tcp:close(Sock).
  673: 
  674: 
  675: encode_client_hello(CH, Random) ->
  676:     HSBin = tls_handshake:encode_handshake(CH, ?TLS_1_2),
  677:     CS = connection_states(Random),
  678:     {Encoded, _} = tls_record:encode_handshake(HSBin, ?TLS_1_2, CS),
  679:     Encoded.
  680: 
  681: client_hello(Random) ->
  682:     CipherSuites = [<<0,255>>, <<"À,">>, <<"À0">>, <<"À$">>, <<"À(">>,
  683: 		    <<"À.">>, <<"À2">>, <<"À&">>, <<"À*">>, <<0,159>>,
  684: 		    <<0,163>>, <<0,107>>, <<0,106>>, <<"À+">>, <<"À/">>,
  685: 		    <<"À#">>, <<"À'">>, <<"À-">>, <<"À1">>, <<"À%">>,
  686: 		    <<"À)">>, <<0,158>>, <<0,162>>, <<0,103>>, <<0,64>>,
  687: 		    <<"À\n">>, <<192,20>>, <<0,57>>, <<0,56>>, <<192,5>>,
  688: 		    <<192,15>>, <<"À\t">>, <<192,19>>, <<0,51>>, <<0,50>>,
  689: 		    <<192,4>>, <<192,14>>],
  690:     Extensions = #{alpn => undefined,
  691: 		   ec_point_formats =>
  692: 		       {ec_point_formats,
  693: 			[0]},
  694: 		   elliptic_curves =>
  695: 		       {elliptic_curves,
  696: 			[{1,3,132,0,39},
  697: 			 {1,3,132,0,38},
  698: 			 {1,3,132,0,35},
  699: 			 {1,3,36,3,3,2,
  700: 			  8,1,1,13},
  701: 			 {1,3,132,0,36},
  702: 			 {1,3,132,0,37},
  703: 			 {1,3,36,3,3,2,
  704: 			  8,1,1,11},
  705: 			 {1,3,132,0,34},
  706: 			 {1,3,132,0,16},
  707: 			 {1,3,132,0,17},
  708: 			 {1,3,36,3,3,2,
  709: 			  8,1,1,7},
  710: 			 {1,3,132,0,10},
  711: 			 {1,2,840,
  712: 			  10045,3,1,7},
  713: 			 {1,3,132,0,3},
  714: 			 {1,3,132,0,26},
  715: 			 {1,3,132,0,27},
  716: 			 {1,3,132,0,32},
  717: 			 {1,3,132,0,33},
  718: 			 {1,3,132,0,24},
  719: 			 {1,3,132,0,25},
  720: 			 {1,3,132,0,31},
  721: 			 {1,2,840,
  722: 			  10045,3,1,1},
  723: 			 {1,3,132,0,1},
  724: 			 {1,3,132,0,2},
  725: 			 {1,3,132,0,15},
  726: 			 {1,3,132,0,9},
  727: 			 {1,3,132,0,8},
  728: 			 {1,3,132,0,
  729: 			  30}]},
  730: 		   next_protocol_negotiation =>
  731: 		       undefined,
  732: 		   renegotiation_info =>
  733: 		       {renegotiation_info,
  734: 			undefined},
  735: 		   signature_algs =>
  736: 		       {hash_sign_algos,
  737: 			[{sha512,ecdsa},
  738: 			 {sha512,rsa},
  739: 			 {sha384,ecdsa},
  740: 			 {sha384,rsa},
  741: 			 {sha256,ecdsa},
  742: 			 {sha256,rsa},
  743: 			 {sha224,ecdsa},
  744: 			 {sha224,rsa},
  745: 			 {sha,ecdsa},
  746: 			 {sha,rsa},
  747: 			 {sha,dsa}]},
  748: 		   sni =>
  749: 		       {sni,
  750: 			"localhost"},
  751: 		   srp =>
  752: 		       undefined},
  753: 
  754:     #client_hello{client_version = ?TLS_1_2,
  755: 		  random = Random,
  756: 		  session_id = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(32),
  757: 		  cipher_suites = CipherSuites,
  758: 		  compression_methods = [0],
  759: 		  extensions = Extensions
  760: 		 }.
  761: 
  762: connection_states(Random) ->
  763:     #{current_write =>
  764:           #{beast_mitigation => one_n_minus_one,cipher_state => undefined,
  765: 		 client_verify_data => undefined,compression_state => undefined,
  766: 		 mac_secret => undefined,secure_renegotiation => undefined,
  767:             security_parameters =>
  768:                 #security_parameters{
  769:                   cipher_suite = <<0,0>>,
  770:                    connection_end = 1,
  771:                    bulk_cipher_algorithm = 0,
  772:                    cipher_type = 0,
  773:                    iv_size = 0,
  774:                    key_material_length = 0,
  775:                    mac_algorithm = 0,
  776:                    prf_algorithm = 0,
  777:                    hash_size = 0,
  778:                    compression_algorithm = 0,
  779:                    master_secret = undefined,
  780:                    resumption_master_secret = undefined,
  781:                    client_random = Random,
  782:                    server_random = undefined},
  783:             sequence_number => 0,server_verify_data => undefined,max_fragment_length => undefined}}.
  784: 
  785: 
  786: 
  787: test_max_session_limit(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName) ->
  788:      Server0 =
  789: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  790: 				   {from, self()},
  791: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  792: 				   {tcp_options, [{active, false}]},
  793: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  794:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  795:     
  796:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  797:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, HostName},
  798:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  799:                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_sessions, save} | ClientOpts]}]),
  800:     SID0 = receive
  801:           {Client0, Id0} ->
  802:                   Id0
  803:           end,
  804:        
  805:    
  806:     Server0 ! listen,
  807:     
  808:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  809:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, HostName},
  810:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  811:                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_sessions, save} | ClientOpts]}]),    
  812:        
  813:     SID1 = receive
  814:                {Client1, Id1} ->
  815:                    Id1 
  816:            end,
  817:        
  818:     false = SID0 == SID1,
  819:     
  820:     
  821:     Server0 ! listen,
  822:     
  823:     Client2 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  824:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, HostName},
  825:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  826:                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_sessions, save}| ClientOpts]}]),  
  827: 
  828:     
  829:     SID2 = receive
  830:                {Client2, Id2} ->
  831:                    Id2 
  832:            end,
  833: 
  834:     Server0 ! listen,
  835:     
  836:     Client3 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  837:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, HostName},
  838:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  839:                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_session, SID2}| ClientOpts]}]),   
  840:     
  841:     receive
  842:         {Client3, SID2} ->
  843:             ok;
  844:         Other  ->
  845:             ct:fail({{expected, SID2}, {got,Other}})
  846:     end.
  847: 
  848: 
  849: sup_name(Opts) ->
  850:    case proplists:get_value(protocol, Opts, tls) of
  851:        tls ->
  852:            ssl_server_session_cache_sup;
  853:        dtls ->
  854:            dtls_server_session_cache_sup
  855:    end.
  856:
